The plant produces small, yellow flowers during the rainy season, adding a subtle beauty to its environment. Its growth habit is typically low and compact, forming a dense mat that helps prevent soil erosion. Due to its resilience, it is often used in xeriscaping and as a drought-tolerant ornamental plant.
